co.paralleluniverse.galaxy

Interface CacheListener


  • public interface CacheListener
    A listener for local cache events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void evicted(long id)
      The data item has been evicted from the local cache.
      void invalidated(long id)
      The data item has been invalidated - probably requested exclusively by another node, or, possibly, deleted.
      void received(long id, long version, ByteBuffer data)
      The data item has been updated by another node.

    • Method Detail

      • invalidated

        void invalidated(long id)
        The data item has been invalidated - probably requested exclusively by another node, or, possibly, deleted.
        Parameters:
        id - The item's ID.

      • received

        void received(long id,
            long version,
            ByteBuffer data)
        The data item has been updated by another node. This is the opposite of the invalidated event. This method is not called when the item is modified locally by a set().
        Parameters:
        id - The item's ID.
        version - The item's version.
        data - The item's contents.

      • evicted

        void evicted(long id)
        The data item has been evicted from the local cache. Only items not owned by the local node can be evicted.
        Parameters:
        id - The item's ID.
